### OPEN DATA

<br>
<br>

Currently the tool is using the following sources of data:

<br>

**DMSP and OLS nightlights data**, from the Earth Observation Group, NOAA National Centers for Environmental Information (NCEI), [source](https://www.ngdc.noaa.gov/eog/download.html).

**UCDP Georeferenced Event Dataset**, from the Department of Peace and Conflict Research, Uppsala University, [source](https://ucdp.uu.se/downloads/).

**Geografical administrative areas**, from GADM, [source](https://gadm.org/data.html).

 </center>
